title: KrtekMeme
author: KrtekMeme
content: Hello and welcome to $KRTEK, the cryptocurrency that brings the beloved Czech animated character to life in the world of digital finance!$KRTEK was created in 2023 by a team of passionate fans of the classic Czech animated series featuring the adorable mole character.We wanted to honor the spirit of the show by creating a fun and playful cryptocurrency that would appeal to fans of all ages.We are a team of dedicated meme enthusiasts who are passionate about bringing joy and humor to the world of cryptocurrency.We believe that $KRTEK has the potential to become a global phenomenon, and we invite you to join us on this exciting journey!All infos here: https://krtekme.meIf you can help me promote this coin, it would be awesome! :-)

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: From what I can tell your post has nothing to do with betting or gambling as a whole so you probably should move your thread to the altcoin discussion since you're trying to shill a project; altcoin discussion is the most appropriate board for your thread.Check the left bottom corner of your thread you'll see "move thread/topic" click on it and then select the appropriate boad which is altcoin discussion in your case.

comments.author: www.Gambler.Casino
comments.body: Information from the site:Quote95% of the $KRTEK supply was added to the liquidity pool and the remaining 5% will sit in the team's marketing wallet. This will be used to promote $KRTEK and provide liquidity for CEXs.Ownership of the contract was waived and liquidity blocked for 100 years.A few days ago, there was already such an offer in one coin. In fact, more coins were added to circulation. I don't think you can trust what the website says.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: "Join us for an endless adventure to the moon!" is your slogan. Here are some things you should improve in your next shitcoin before launching it ->1. Hire a professional web developer and get a good-looking website to attract people so they buy your shitcoin.2. Try to name it better, KRTEK is the worst name ever I have heard in the recent shitcoin hurdle.3. Remove "CEX Listings" from your roadmap, that ain't happening anytime soon.

comments.author: terciduk123

Here are some things you should improve in your next shitcoin before launching it ->1. Hire a professional web developer and get a good-looking website to attract people so they buy your shitcoin.2. Try to name it better, KRTEK is the worst name ever I have heard in the recent shitcoin hurdle.3. Remove "CEX Listings" from your roadmap, that ain't happening anytime soon.I agree with this.Your website needs to be improved to make it more attractive. your current site seems very cheap.Token holders are also very few, less than 200 addresses. You need to work harder to increase your token holders.

comments.author: KrtekMeme
comments.created_time: May 20, 2023, 10:10:34 AMLast edit: May 20, 2023, 10:33:09 AM by KrtekMeme

This will be used to promote $KRTEK and provide liquidity for CEXs.Ownership of the contract was waived and liquidity blocked for 100 years.A few days ago, there was already such an offer in one coin. In fact, more coins were added to circulation. I don't think you can trust what the website says.It is not possible to add more coins...please inform yourself how smart contracts work before commenting stuff like this. There is a max supply.Quote from: ImThour on May 14, 2023, 02:27:11 PM"Join us for an endless adventure to the moon!" is your slogan. Here are some things you should improve in your next shitcoin before launching it ->1. Hire a professional web developer and get a good-looking website to attract people so they buy your shitcoin.2. Don't know what your problem is with the website!? When i look at other meme coin websites, ours is a masterpiece.2. You probably don't know the mole character right?3. I removed it from Stage 1, it's hard, you are right.FYI yesterday we made it to 100K MC. Let's see what the future brings Thank you for your honest opinion!Quote from: terciduk123 on May 18, 2023, 05:51:16 AMQuote from: ImThour on May 14, 2023, 02:27:11 PM"Join us for an endless adventure to the moon!" is your slogan. You need to work harder to increase your token holders.Website looks great! Why so much hate? What is cheap about the website? Tastes are different. Just be glad that the next shiba doge inu AI shit isn't presented here...Any suggestions how I can work harder to push it to 200K MC and more token holders? 150 holders currently is good..FYI I started this alone like a week ago.I mean guys look at this graph: https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0x9CfFcAD55d78B1370dE77e00C47B057EbE44334C
